full_summary:
# Janitorial Services
**Contract Title**: Janitorial Services (housekeeping) - CanmetENERGY Varennes
**Notice Reference**: PW-23-01021957
**Solicitation Number**: NRCan-5000071260

## Tender Overview

A Request for Proposal (RFP) has been issued by Natural Resources Canada (NRCan) for the provision of janitorial services at the CanmetEnergy building in Varennes. 

### Description

The selected contractor will be required to provide housekeeping services at the CanmetEnergy building for a period of three (3) years, with an optional extension of two (2) years.

### RFP Details

*   **Estimated Quantity**: 1 year with 2 years options
*   **Duration of Contract**: 2023-05-26 to 2026-05-26
*   **Optional Site Visit**: February 1, 2023 at 02:00 PM (EST)

## Notice Information

*   **Publication Date**: January 18, 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date**: February 16, 2023 at 14:00:00
*   **Amendment Date**: February 10, 2023
*   **Tender Status**: Expired

## Contact Information

*   Anik Samson
    Phone: 613-408-3462
    Email: <anik.samson@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca>
    Address: 580 Booth Street, Ottawa, ON, K1A 0E4, Canada

## Attachments

RFP documents and amendments can be downloaded from the Canada Buy Small Business website.

Please let me know if you have any other requests.
